price: 14. Waa tan Naartii aad beenin jirteen.
arabic: هَٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: hādhihi al-nāru allatī kuntum bihā tukadhibūna
